attributes.action: Reveiw the benifit system and make apropriate changes to encourage people to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this petition to change the benifit system. As i belive it is to easy for people to claim and stay on benifits, instead of returning to employment. Why should we the worker struggle to make ends meet, when we see people living the high life on handouts. It makes me think would i be better off quiting my job and joining the free life band wagon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
